[Helpful Poppet](/Feats.aspx?ID=3341) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 63</row>

</column>

---

You're particularly skilled at helping others with a task. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on checks to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75), and you don't give your ally a –1 circumstance penalty to their check if you critically fail your attempt to Aid.
